channel.title: Godot 101 on Godot 3 Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Godot 101 on Godot 3 Recipes

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started Have you downloaded Godot yet? You can get it here: https://godotengine.org In this section: What is Godot? Godot's Editor: Finding your way around Nodes: Godot's building blocks

item.title: GDScript
item.description: GDScript GDScript is Godot’s built-in scripting language. Its syntax is based on Python, so if you’re familiar with that language, you’ll feel right at home. In this chapter, we’ll introduce the language and get you up to speed with how it works. In this section: GDScript: Getting started

item.title: Intro to 3D
item.description: Intro to 3D A gentle introduction to the 3D side of Godot development. In this section: The 3D Editor Importing 3D Objects Creating a 3D Character Using Areas Edge Detection & Mouse Capture Using CSG First-person Character
